definition: plowing and weeding/farm work/fig. to work or study diligently
you get what you put in/you reap what you sow
pinyin: yi1 fen1 geng1 yun2 , yi1 fen1 shou1 huo4

definition: to make industrious and diligent efforts (idiom)

sentences.english: To a farmer, though, this is a sight full of great promise.
sentences.chinese: 而对于一位耕耘者，这却是充满希望的一幕。

sentences.english: It is the same for the cultivator.
Ethics, in the hope the field of hard work.
sentences.chinese: 师德，是在希望田野上的辛勤耕耘。

sentences.english: Therefore, Faith is of great importance to the cultivator.
sentences.chinese: 因此，诚信是非常重要的耕耘。

sentences.english: No pains, a harvest, a certain.
sentences.chinese: 九份耕耘一份收获，一定。

sentences.english: Don't punish yourself by swallowing the “no pain, no gain” philosophy.
sentences.chinese: 不必用“一分耕耘，一分收获”的想法让自己吃苦。

sentences.english: The sweat of the plough is the milk that feeds the seed.
sentences.chinese: 耕耘者的汗水是哺育种子成长的乳汁。

sentences.english: As long as assiduous and cultivated, perserve, final and regular meeting has good get one's own back.
sentences.chinese: 只要勤奋耕耘，持之以恒，最终一定会有好的回报。

sentences.english: Instructing you rush me trials and hardships, my blessings with you day and night.
sentences.chinese: 您的教诲催我风雨兼程，我的祝福伴您昼夜耕耘。

sentences.english: Remember you will only receive a harvest in proportion to what you’ve sown for.
sentences.chinese: 谨记，一分耕耘一分收获。

sentences.english: Nung-fu went to the equipment store, bought the repair kit to fix the carburetor of the tractor.
sentences.chinese: 农夫去修护店购买耕耘机汽化器修理零件组合。

sentences.english: Immediately above it is a photo of the farm where no-till is being practiced “all the way.
sentences.chinese: 题目正上方就是一张农田的照片，农田完全未耕耘。

sentences.english: Guangzhou Lenv of hard work to win customers' trust.
sentences.chinese: 广州伦威的辛勤耕耘，赢来客户的信任。

sentences.english: I must do farm work industriously, toleration distress.
sentences.chinese: 我要辛勤耕耘，忍受苦楚。

sentences.english: As the saying goes, No pain no gain, only hard to be successful.
sentences.chinese: 俗话说，一分耕耘一分收获，只有努力了才能成功。

sentences.english: It is said that relations victory Lizhen her tireless hard work on the politics of the harvest.
sentences.chinese: 有人说，关丽珍的胜利是她在政坛上不懈耕耘的收获。

definition: to make industrious and diligent efforts (idiom)
deep plowing/thorough penetration/thorough development (of a market segment etc)
to make a living by writing/to write (as an author)
heavily laden with fruit/fertile (of trees)/many noteworthy achievements
